price: 62. Ogaada, hubaal, awliyada Alle ma ahaaneyso cabsi korkooda mana murugoonayaan9.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّ أَوۡلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
footnotes: 9. Abuu Saciid Al-Khudri a.k.r. waxaa laga soo weriyey in Rasuulkii Alle s.c.w. yidhi: Markii qofka la saaro meydkiisa alwaaxa janaazada (oo janaasadu tahay diyaar) oo raggu ku qaadaan garbahooda, haddii mowtanahu ahaa qof wanaagsan waxay tidhaahdaa: I dedejiya I dedejiya, haddiise uu ahaa qof aan wanaagsaneyn waxay odhan: Hooggeeda'e xaggee u siddaan. Waxaa maqla codkeeda wax walba aadanaha maahee, hadduu maqli lahaana waa uu suuxi lahaa." (W.w. Al-Bukhaari).

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alā inna awliyāa al-lahi lā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
